metadata.synopsis: This PAD is played when the player returns to the circus, but it's gone. It could be expected - because the player had completed the Dribbles quest, or if the Rinmaster was killed, so the phrase and emotion should stay vague.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A,Make circus disappear:a) complete Dribbles quest,b) kill Ringmaster and long rest,c) start combat with the clown, leave it and long restd) oe WYR_Circus_TestDisappearReturn.
